content: tiilda hat by inese sang all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 1 size one size - to fit head circumference of 22 -23 56 cm-58 5 cm yarn & yardage bulky chunky weight approximately 147 yds 135 m including a 3 3/8 85 mm size p ompom pictured in deramores vintage chunky 50% merino wool 50% acrylic 153 yds 140 m / 100 gr colour chalk needles us 6 4 mm circulars with 16 40 cm cable us 8 5 mm circulars with 16 40 cm cable us 8 5 mm double pointed needles for the crown decrease shaping gauge 15 sts x 22 row to 4 10 cm in stockinette on larger size needles notions cable needle tapestry needle stitch marker optional to mark the beginning of rounds 3 3/8 85 mm or size desired pompom maker note choosing different size pompom maker will affect the total yardage of the project abbreviations & stitch guide co cast on bobble bind off sts - stitches k knit p purl m1l make one left insert left hand needle from front to back under the strand of yarn which runs between the stitch just worked and the next stitch on left hand needle lift the strand up and knit through back loop c2b slip next stitch onto cable needle and hold at the back of work k1 then k1 from the cable needle c4b slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at the back of work k2 then k2 from the cable needle c6b slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and hold at the back of work k3 then k3 from the cable needle c6f slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and hold at the front of work k3 then k3 from the cable needle k2tog knit 2 sts together all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 2 p2tog purl 2 sts together repeat repeat round / rnds round / rounds pattern begins using us 6 4 mm needles and the long tail cast-on co 82 sts join to begin working in the round making sure not to twist the stitches ribbing round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 for 10 more times set up round change to us 8 5 mm needles *k10 m1l repeat from * 7 more times k2 90 sts main body refer to chart 1 on page 4 for the cable panel pattern repeat round 1 *k9 p2 k2 p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 2 *c6b k3 p2 c2b p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 *k9 p2 c2b p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 5 repeat round 1 round 6 *k3 c6f p2 c2b p2 repeat from *
